title: Always exciting
text: The visit to the archeologiical site of the Acropolis it's something unique, moving and breathtaking. You can't miss it!

title: Not to be missed
text:
Amazing the collection.
Amazing the architecture.
Amazing the lunch or the dinner at the restaurant with a stunning view to The Acropolis!

title: excellent!
text:
A lovely apartment, very comfortable, neat and tidy, close to the Acropolis Museum.
In ten minutes walking you reach Monastiraki and Plaka, the entrance to the Acropolis, the ancient Theatre of Erode Atticus, and restaurants or coffeebar.
Kukaki is perfect if you don't want to be in the crowd.
My apartment, n7, was really nice, I liked the furniture and the interior, and the little balcony.
The staff was warmly welcoming.
